example.text: This is the same man who sat in front of [[user]] and told us the border was secure. [[url]]

Aside from voting, this is one of the primary jobs of a Congressman. I enjoy meeting with groups that stop by, and I thank those people for their time and for their willingness to work on difficult issues.
The first step to any immigration reform? Securing the border. And that's exactly what HR 2 does. [[url]]

The President's Proclamation places at a disadvantage the United States solar manufacturers with unfair import competition while benefiting Chinese solar companies. HJ Res. 39 would stop the Commerce Department from implementing the Final Rule effectuating this Proclamation, while serving as a powerful warning to future presidents against undermining enforcement of United States Trade laws.
